meanings.sent1: The park was filled with happy bambini playing on the swings.
meanings.sent2: The teacher read a story to the bambini before nap time.
meanings.sent3: The giggles of the bambini echoed through the classroom.
meanings.sent4: In the painting, the artist captured the innocence of the bambini.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter from the bambini was music to her ears.

meanings.definition: Bambini (plural noun): A group of young children.
meanings.sent1: The bambini held hands as they walked to the playground.
meanings.sent2: The birthday party was filled with excited bambini running around.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous bambini hid their teacher's chalk as a prank.
meanings.sent4: The field trip was a sea of colorful backpacks carried by the bambini.
meanings.sent5: The group of bambini sang songs together during music class.
